entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
